page.title: 19 Fashion
page.content: The fashionable clothes for girls today is a short light coloured skirt called a mini skirt.The hem of the skirt is mid thigh level.The mini skirt is tight fitting and it is usually worn with a matching belt and cotton top.The top has a slash neck and batwing sleeves and is worn loose over the top of the skirt. Some people are punks.They style their hair in different colours and they wear chains round their necks.They wear leather jackets and leather jeans and big boots.Punks use hair gel to spike up their hair.Some punks shave the side of their heads and have Mohicans.
